text:
People need help to make it through this pandemic.
Help to pay their rent.
Help to put food on the table.
Help to make ends meet.

And the vast majority don't want a rushed Supreme Court confirmation. Senate Republicans' priorities are simply not the American people’s priorities.

I laid it out for everyone watching: the Affordable Care Act and all its protections hinge on this seat and the outcome of this hearing. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EkQIyzLWkAIThZi.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1316185919611899905/vid/320x320/ClGwCNHbW7iEwlKy.mp4?tag=13

I just shared Felicia’s story in the hearing. The fight to save the Affordable Care Act is a matter of life and death for her. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EkP0dAFWkAABwBw.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1316163698998816769/vid/320x320/yYmjlOfGeCD8stb5.mp4?tag=13

In a moment, I’ll be questioning Trump’s Supreme Court nominee about her record and what’s at stake if she is confirmed. Tune in live here. https://www.pscp.tv/w/clTT0zFWR2p2cUFEeURPS098MWpNS2dYZXFhd2VHTPZZQLYWvd6e-e7dc_MvHgL2KuuSsm469-66ykCCMWdu

My Republican colleagues know that a majority of Americans want whomever wins this election to fill this Supreme Court seat. They are deliberately defying the will of the people in their attempt to strike down the Affordable Care Act.

RT @SenateDems .@SenKamalaHarris tells the story of Myka, a young Californian who can afford the treatment she needs because of the ACA’s protections. Those protections will be in jeopardy if Republicans succeed in forcing Judge Barrett’s nomination through. #WhatsAtStake #SCOTUSHearings http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EkJ5MZ7XkAYlNzU.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1315743752540114945/vid/320x320/0Gq7GvobvK6sWyTA.mp4?tag=13

Republicans have failed to repeal the Affordable Care Act in Congress, so now they are trying to bypass the will of voters and have the Supreme Court do their dirty work. That's what this nomination is about.

If Republicans confirm this nominee, it could mean 23 million Americans lose their health insurance and the elimination of protections for 135 million people with preexisting conditions. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EkOGwY3XYAAnxZN.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1316042887352721408/vid/320x320/cWh64IMbHw3u34fl.mp4?tag=13

I’ll say it again: these hearings are an attempt to jam through a Supreme Court nominee who will take health care away from millions of people during a deadly pandemic that has already killed 215,000 Americans.

The budget is a statement of values.

Democrats value help for the American people to keep a roof over their heads, to put food on the table, and to have money in their pockets to meet the needs of their families in this crisis. 

Look at the details. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1316164859642470400/pu/img/jAifpOQ65LDG6FCQ.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1316164859642470400/pu/vid/480x270/ASQj2Md-fPD8d-PU.mp4?tag=10

Let's get one thing straight: Republicans don't share our values of fighting #ForThePeople. #VOTE http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1316153304104267779/pu/img/blZQheVhTYxhdmUo.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1316153304104267779/pu/vid/480x270/a1N4IwEvSaY-epm1.mp4?tag=10

I agree with @SenBlumenthal—if this election is decided by the Supreme Court rather than the American people, the legitimacy of the Court and our democracy is on the line. If Judge Barrett is confirmed, she must recuse herself from any cases that could result from this election. https://twitter.com/SenateDems/status/1316144694477414406 QT @SenateDems “It would be a dagger at the heart of the Court and our democracy if this election is decided by the Court rather than the American voters.”

—@SenBlumenthal explains #WhatsAtStake if President Trump gets his way & his nominee decides the fate of this election #SCOTUShearings http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EkPigANX0AECVLm.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1316142044046397440/vid/320x320/dzZrixh9vAQdmdwx.mp4?tag=13

Today I asked Judge Barrett: Do you believe that every president should make a commitment unequivocally and resolutely to the peaceful transfer of power? This should have been an easy question. Judge Barrett refused to answer. This is not normal. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1316177310618472450/img/McLOj0XiqxNzAX2q.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1316177310618472450/vid/480x270/nymxq-KAnhRTZ1xm.mp4?tag=13

Let’s be clear: Senate Republicans are rushing this process in the middle of a pandemic & an ongoing election because they've found a nominee in Judge Barrett who they know will do what they couldn’t do—subvert the will of the American people & overturn the ACA & Roe v. Wade.

RT @CAPAction BREAKING: @CoryBooker just asked Judge Barrett if she believes that every president should commit to the peaceful transfer of power.

Barrett’s refusal to answer speaks volumes. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1316130007111159808/pu/img/1zqn4V7hoInZsKcj.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1316130007111159808/pu/vid/480x270/j02_8JVDS4FvdQei.mp4?tag=10

A vote for Judge Barrett is a vote to end health care coverage for millions of Americans and take away protections for the 130 million Americans who have pre-existing conditions. That’s #WhatsAtStake—we can’t be silent in this moment.

https://cnsnews.com/article/washington/susan-jones/sen-cruz-who-their-right-mind-would-want-usa-ruled-5-unelected

Judge Barrett has impeccable credentials & is well qualified to serve on the Supreme Court. Looking forward to continuing Judge Barrett’s confirmation hearing today & speaking with her about how she intends to protect our U.S. Constitution & Bill of Rights as a #SCOTUS justice.

Democrats have no meaningful criticisms of Judge Barrett. That’s why, instead of discussing her qualifications, her faithfulness to the law, or her judicial temperament, Democrats spent yesterday making political and policy arguments. I expect to see more of the same today.

If we wake up in January with Biden, Schumer, and Pelosi in charge, Democrats will end the filibuster in the Senate, they will add two new states to the U.S. to increase the number of Democrat seats in the Senate, and they will pack the Court. Every Senate Democrat is in on it. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1315996020577382400/img/rNI-Auy_2iXdOvy9.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1315996020577382400/vid/480x270/0y-ShRESe3Ur4MNh.mp4?tag=13

To suggest sexual orientation is a choice? It's not. It's a key part of a person's identity.

A $20/month @SocialSecurity increase just isn’t enough right now. That’s why @SenSchumer, @RonWyden and I announced a plan in March to boost benefits by $200/month. We need to give Social Security recipients a real cost-of-living adjustment. https://thehill.com/homenews/senate/488803-democrats-call-for-stimulus-to-boost-social-security-benefits-by-200-a-month

The formula to calculate the COLA is out of touch with the costs @SocialSecurity recipients face. Seniors spend much more of their budget on medical care. Their cost-of-living increases should reflect the rising costs of medical care more than, say, lower gas prices during COVID.

This tiny 1.3% @SocialSecurity cost-of-living adjustment (COLA) is wildly inadequate for the millions of seniors, veterans, and people with disabilities who are struggling to pay their bills during this crisis. https://www.cnbc.com/2020/10/13/social-security-cost-of-living-adjustment-will-be-1point3percent-in-2021.html

Last night, @JimmyKimmel asked me what I thought of the Supreme Court hearings. I told him: this Republican effort to rip away health care should not be taking place. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EkP0kizWsAMTdwY.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1316163451027365888/vid/320x320/ekFtf8vh-wGUxnkb.mp4?tag=13

I wrote a bill before Trump was sworn in to enforce the clause banning the President from taking foreign payments. I expanded it in my bill to #EndCorruptionNow. If the Court won’t uphold the ban on these conflicts, Congress should do it and pass my bill. https://www.washingtonpost.com/politics/courts_law/supreme-court-wont-revive-congressional-emoluments-case-against-trump/2020/10/13/6b26da36-0d5e-11eb-8a35-237ef1eb2ef7_story.html
